title: Squire armor
summaries: Squire armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep after defeating any mechanical boss, for the price of 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total, which consists of the Squire's Great Helm, Squire's Plating, and Squire's Greaves.
A full set of Squire armor provides the following benefits:

• +58 defense
  • +15% melee damage
  • +30% summon damage
  • +15% melee critical strike chance
  • +15% movement speed
  • +2 sentry slots
  • +2 HP/second health regeneration

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the <linked>velocity</linked> of the <linked>Ballista</linked> sentries' projectiles and will increase the maximum number of enemies that can be pierced by them from 3 to 6. It also grants the wearer the <linked>Ballista Panic!</linked> <linked>buff</linked> upon taking any damage, which increases the fire rate of all Ballista sentries summoned by the player for 5 seconds.
The <linked>Valhalla Knight armor</linked> can be considered a direct upgrade of the Squire armor.
